# This file was generated, DO NOT edit, you WILL lose the stuff here if someone triggers generation again.

crashing_column = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 4
    group = column

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        is_flanking = no
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 10
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 3

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = plane
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 1

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = encircled
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 2

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = twod
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = funnel
            } }
        }

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 5.0

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = funnel
            } }
        }

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 10

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = plane
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial <= 10
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = short_range_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = defensive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = pursuit_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                religion = neo_feudal
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = defensive_leader
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.9
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.1
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.9
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.1
    pikemen_offensive = -0.9
    pikemen_defensive = 0.0
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.9
    light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
    knights_offensive = -0.9
    knights_defensive = 0.1
    archers_offensive = -0.7
    archers_defensive = -0.1


    enemy = {
        group = funnel
        factor = 0.5
    }

    enemy = {
        group = plane
        factor = 1
    }
}

    sprite = 1
    days = 7
    group = funnel

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 10

        days = 100

                flank_has_tactic = cone

        }

            value = 20

                flank_has_tactic = encircled
            } }
        }

            leader = {
                martial <= 10

                trait = defensive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                religion = neo_feudal
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 40
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.4
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 50
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.6
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.2
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.2
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.0

crashing_piercethrough = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 1

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 10
            martial >= 4
        }
        OR = {
            flank_has_tactic = balanced_column
            flank_has_tactic = laser_column
            flank_has_tactic = kinetic_column
            flank_has_tactic = defensive_column
            flank_has_tactic = boarding_column
            flank_has_tactic = crashing_column
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial <= 10
                martial >= 4
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = trickster
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = shock_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = pursuit_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                religion = neo_feudal
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = defensive_leader
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.9
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.1
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.9
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.1
    pikemen_offensive = -0.9
    pikemen_defensive = 0.0

crashing_rearattack = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 6
    group = rearattack

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 10
            martial >= 6
        }
        OR = {
            flank_has_tactic = balanced_piercethrough
            flank_has_tactic = laser_piercethrough
            flank_has_tactic = kinetic_piercethrough
            flank_has_tactic = defensive_piercethrough
            flank_has_tactic = boarding_piercethrough
            flank_has_tactic = crashing_piercethrough
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = plane
            } }
        }

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 10

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = encircled
            } }
        }

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 20

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = twod
            } }
        }

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 40

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = funnel
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial <= 10
                martial >= 6
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = marine_captain
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = army_captain
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = pursuit_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                religion = neo_feudal
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = defensive_leader
            }
        }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.1

    knights_defensive = -0.1

    archers_defensive = -0.3


    enemy = {
        group = plane

        group = encircled

        group = twod

balanced_plane = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 8
    group = plane

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 18
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 20

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = twod
            } }
        }

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 5.0

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = encircled
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial <= 18
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = twod_thinking
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = trickster
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = shock_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = omnicidal_maniac
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = 2.0
    light_infantry_defensive = -0.5
    heavy_infantry_offensive = 2.0
    heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.5
    pikemen_offensive = 2.0
    pikemen_defensive = -0.6
    light_cavalry_offensive = 2.0
    light_cavalry_defensive = -0.6
    knights_offensive = 2.0
    knights_defensive = -0.5
    archers_offensive = 0.0
    archers_defensive = -0.7


    enemy = {
        group = twod
        factor = 2

    enemy = {
        group = encircled

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 18
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 20

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = twod
            } }
        }

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 5.0

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = encircled
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial <= 18
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = twod_thinking
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = trickster
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = shock_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = omnicidal_maniac
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                religion = neo_feudal
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = 4.5
    light_infantry_defensive = -0.4
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -1.0
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.3
    pikemen_offensive = 4.7
    pikemen_defensive = -0.4
    light_cavalry_offensive = 3.2
    light_cavalry_defensive = -0.2
    knights_offensive = 2.5
    knights_defensive = 0.0
    archers_offensive = -0.2
    archers_defensive = -0.7


    enemy = {
        group = twod
        factor = 2
    }

    enemy = {
        group = encircled
        factor = 0.5
    }
}

defensive_plane = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 8
    group = plane

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 18
            NOT = { trait = pursuit_specialist }
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 20

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = twod
            } }
        }

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 5.0

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = encircled
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial <= 18
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = twod_thinking
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = trickster
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = shock_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = omnicidal_maniac
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = frigate_pilot
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = 0.5
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
    heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.5
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
    pikemen_offensive = 0.5
    pikemen_defensive = -0.2
    light_cavalry_offensive = 0.5
    light_cavalry_defensive = -0.2
    knights_offensive = 0.5
    knights_defensive = -0.1
    archers_offensive = 0.1
    archers_defensive = -0.5


    enemy = {
        group = twod
        factor = 2
    }

    enemy = {
        group = encircled
        factor = 0.5
    }
}

boarding_plane = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 8
    group = plane

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 18
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 20

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = twod
            } }
        }

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 5.0

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = encircled
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial <= 18
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = twod_thinking
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = trickster
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = shock_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = omnicidal_maniac
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                religion = neo_feudal
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = defensive_leader
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = 0.2
    light_infantry_defensive = -0.6
    heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.2
    heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.6
    pikemen_offensive = 0.2
    pikemen_defensive = -0.6
    light_cavalry_offensive = 0.2
    light_cavalry_defensive = -0.6
    knights_offensive = 0.2
    knights_defensive = -0.6
    archers_offensive = 2.1
    archers_defensive = -0.7


    enemy = {
        group = twod
        factor = 2
    }

    enemy = {
        group = encircled
        factor = 0.5
    }
}

crashing_plane = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 8
    group = plane

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 18
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 20

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = twod
            } }
        }

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 5.0

            leader = { enemy = {
                flank_has_tactic = encircled
            } }
        }

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial <= 18
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = twod_thinking
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = trickster
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = shock_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = omnicidal_maniac
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                religion = neo_feudal
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = defensive_leader
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = 0.2
    light_infantry_defensive = -0.6
    heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.2
    heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.6
    pikemen_offensive = 0.2
    pikemen_defensive = -0.6
    light_cavalry_offensive = 0.2
    light_cavalry_defensive = -0.7
    knights_offensive = 0.2
    knights_defensive = -0.7
    archers_offensive = 0.6
    archers_defensive = -0.8


    enemy = {
        group = twod
        factor = 2
    }

    enemy = {
        group = encircled
        factor = 0.5
    }
}

balanced_line = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 8
    group = twod

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 18
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial <= 18
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = twod_thinking
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = range_generalist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = unyielding_leader
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.1
    light_infantry_defensive = -0.5
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.1
    heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.5
    pikemen_offensive = -0.1
    pikemen_defensive = -0.6
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.1
    light_cavalry_defensive = -0.6
    knights_offensive = -0.1
    knights_defensive = -0.5
    archers_offensive = -0.4
    archers_defensive = -0.7

}

laser_line = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 8
    group = twod

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 18
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial <= 18
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = twod_thinking
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.8
    light_infantry_defensive = -0.5
    heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.8
    heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.6
    pikemen_offensive = -0.9
    pikemen_defensive = -0.6
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.4
    light_cavalry_defensive = -0.6
    knights_offensive = -0.2
    knights_defensive = -0.6
    archers_offensive = -0.6
    archers_defensive = -0.6

}

kinetic_line = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 8
    group = twod

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 18
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial <= 18
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = twod_thinking
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = kinetic_master
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                religion = neo_feudal
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = 0.6
    light_infantry_defensive = -0.4
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -1.0
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.3
    pikemen_offensive = 0.7
    pikemen_defensive = -0.4
    light_cavalry_offensive = 0.2
    light_cavalry_defensive = -0.2
    knights_offensive = 0.1
    knights_defensive = 0.0
    archers_offensive = -0.6
    archers_defensive = -0.7

}

defensive_line = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 8
    group = twod

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 18
            NOT = { trait = pursuit_specialist }
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial <= 18
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = twod_thinking
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = long_range_combat_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = defensive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = unyielding_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = frigate_pilot
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.6
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.6
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
    pikemen_offensive = -0.6
    pikemen_defensive = -0.2
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.6
    light_cavalry_defensive = -0.2
    knights_offensive = -0.6
    knights_defensive = -0.1
    archers_offensive = -0.2
    archers_defensive = -0.5

}

boarding_line = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 8
    group = twod

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 18
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial <= 18
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = twod_thinking
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = army_captain
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30

            }

            value = 30

    days = 8
    group = twod

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes

            martial <= 18

defensive_wedge = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 8
    group = twod

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 18
            NOT = { trait = pursuit_specialist }
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial <= 18
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = twod_thinking
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = defensive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = unyielding_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = frigate_pilot
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.5
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.8
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.5
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 1.0
    pikemen_offensive = -0.5
    pikemen_defensive = 0.6
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.5
    light_cavalry_defensive = 0.7
    knights_offensive = -0.5
    knights_defensive = 0.9
    archers_offensive = 0.0
    archers_defensive = 0.4

}

    sprite = 1
    days = 8
    group = twod

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 18
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {

        additive_modifier = {

            leader = {
                trait = twod_thinking
            }

        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30

            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30

            value = 30

                religion = neo_feudal
            }
        }

            value = -30

                trait = defensive_leader

    pikemen_defensive = -0.2

crashing_wedge = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 8
    group = twod

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 18
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial <= 18
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = twod_thinking
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = pursuit_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                religion = neo_feudal
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = defensive_leader
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.6
    light_infantry_defensive = -0.2
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.6
    heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.2
    pikemen_offensive = -0.6
    pikemen_defensive = -0.3
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.6
    light_cavalry_defensive = -0.3
    knights_offensive = -0.6
    knights_defensive = -0.3
    archers_offensive = 0.4
    archers_defensive = -0.6

}

balanced_vee = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 8
    group = twod

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 18
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial <= 18
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = twod_thinking
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = short_range_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = 0.0
    light_infantry_defensive = -0.1
    heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.0
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.0
    pikemen_offensive = 0.0
    pikemen_defensive = 0.0
    light_cavalry_offensive = 0.0
    light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
    knights_offensive = 0.0
    knights_defensive = 0.0
    archers_offensive = -0.3
    archers_defensive = 0.0

}

laser_vee = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 8
    group = twod

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 18
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial <= 18
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = twod_thinking
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = short_range_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.8
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.0
    heavy_infantry_offensive = 1.0
    heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.2
    pikemen_offensive = -0.9
    pikemen_defensive = -0.1
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.4
    light_cavalry_defensive = -0.1
    knights_offensive = -0.2
    knights_defensive = -0.1
    archers_offensive = -0.5
    archers_defensive = 0.0

}

kinetic_vee = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 8
    group = twod

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 18
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial <= 18
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = twod_thinking
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = short_range_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                religion = neo_feudal
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = 0.8
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.2
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -1.0
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 1.8
    pikemen_offensive = 0.9
    pikemen_defensive = 0.3
    light_cavalry_offensive = 0.4
    light_cavalry_defensive = 0.8
    knights_offensive = 0.2
    knights_defensive = 1.3
    archers_offensive = -0.5
    archers_defensive = 0.0

}

defensive_vee = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 8
    group = twod

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 18
            NOT = { trait = pursuit_specialist }
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial <= 18
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = twod_thinking
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = short_range_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = unyielding_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = frigate_pilot
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.5
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.8
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.5
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 1.0
    pikemen_offensive = -0.5
    pikemen_defensive = 0.6
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.5
    light_cavalry_defensive = 0.7
    knights_offensive = -0.5
    knights_defensive = 0.9
    archers_offensive = 0.0
    archers_defensive = 0.4

}

boarding_vee = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 8
    group = twod

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 18
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial <= 18
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = twod_thinking
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = short_range_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                religion = neo_feudal
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = defensive_leader
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.6
    light_infantry_defensive = -0.2
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.6
    heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.2
    pikemen_offensive = -0.6
    pikemen_defensive = -0.2
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.6
    light_cavalry_defensive = -0.1
    knights_offensive = -0.6
    knights_defensive = -0.1
    archers_offensive = 1.8
    archers_defensive = -0.1

}

crashing_vee = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 8
    group = twod

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 18
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial <= 18
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = twod_thinking
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = short_range_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                religion = neo_feudal
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = defensive_leader
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.6
    light_infantry_defensive = -0.2
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.6
    heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.2
    pikemen_offensive = -0.6
    pikemen_defensive = -0.3

    archers_defensive = -0.6

balanced_noform = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 8
    group = encircled

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = no
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = 0.1
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.1
    heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.1
    heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.1
    pikemen_offensive = 0.0
    pikemen_defensive = 0.1
    light_cavalry_offensive = 0.1
    light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
    knights_offensive = 0.1
    knights_defensive = -0.1
    archers_offensive = -0.4
    archers_defensive = -0.1

}

    light_infantry_defensive = 0.0

    heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.3

    pikemen_defensive = -0.2

}

balanced_failfunnel = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 8
    group = encircled

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 25
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial <= 25
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = short_range_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = trickster
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -40
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.4
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.2
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -50
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.6
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = 1.1
    light_infantry_defensive = -0.4
    heavy_infantry_offensive = 1.1
    heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.4
    pikemen_offensive = 1.1
    pikemen_defensive = -0.5
    light_cavalry_offensive = 1.1
    light_cavalry_defensive = -0.4
    knights_offensive = 1.1
    knights_defensive = -0.4
    archers_offensive = 0.5
    archers_defensive = -0.4

}

laser_failfunnel = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 8
    group = encircled

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 25
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial <= 25
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = short_range_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = trickster
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -40
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.4
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.2
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -50
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.6
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.6
    light_infantry_defensive = -0.3
    heavy_infantry_offensive = 3.2
    heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.5
    pikemen_offensive = -0.8
    pikemen_defensive = -0.5
    light_cavalry_offensive = 0.3
    light_cavalry_defensive = -0.5
    knights_offensive = 0.8
    knights_defensive = -0.4
    archers_offensive = 0.1
    archers_defensive = -0.4

}

kinetic_failfunnel = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 8
    group = encircled

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 25
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {

            }
        }

            value = 30

            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }

            value = 30

            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.2
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -50
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.6
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = 2.8
    light_infantry_defensive = -0.3
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -1.0
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.4
    pikemen_offensive = 3.0
    pikemen_defensive = -0.3
    light_cavalry_offensive = 1.9
    light_cavalry_defensive = -0.1
    knights_offensive = 1.5
    knights_defensive = 0.2

defensive_failfunnel = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 8
    group = encircled

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 25
            NOT = { trait = pursuit_specialist }
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial <= 25
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = short_range_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = trickster
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = unyielding_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = frigate_pilot
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -40
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.4
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.2
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -50
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.6
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = 0.1
    light_infantry_defensive = 0.2
    heavy_infantry_offensive = 0.1
    heavy_infantry_defensive = 0.2
    pikemen_offensive = 0.1
    pikemen_defensive = -0.1
    light_cavalry_offensive = 0.1
    light_cavalry_defensive = 0.0
    knights_offensive = 0.1
    knights_defensive = 0.1
    archers_offensive = 0.9
    archers_defensive = -0.1

}

boarding_failfunnel = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 8
    group = encircled

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 25
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial <= 25
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = short_range_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = trickster
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                religion = neo_feudal
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {

            }
        }

            troops = {
                who = troops

                enemy = yes
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.2
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -50
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.6
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.2
    light_infantry_defensive = -0.5
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.2
    heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.5
    pikemen_offensive = -0.2
    pikemen_defensive = -0.6
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.2
    light_cavalry_defensive = -0.5
    knights_offensive = -0.2
    knights_defensive = -0.5
    archers_offensive = 4.5
    archers_defensive = -0.5

}

crashing_failfunnel = {
    sprite = 1
    days = 8
    group = encircled

    trigger = {
        phase = melee
        days >= 1
        flank_has_leader = yes
        leader = {
            martial <= 25
        }
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 100

        mult_modifier = {
            factor = 4
            leader = {
                martial <= 25
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = short_range_specialist
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = trickster
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                trait = aggressive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = 30
            leader = {
                religion = neo_feudal
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            leader = {
                trait = defensive_leader
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -40
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.4
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -30
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.2
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
        additive_modifier = {
            value = -50
            troops = {
                who = troops
                value > 1.6
                enemy = yes
            }
        }
    }

    light_infantry_offensive = -0.2
    light_infantry_defensive = -0.5
    heavy_infantry_offensive = -0.2
    heavy_infantry_defensive = -0.5
    pikemen_offensive = -0.2
    pikemen_defensive = -0.6
    light_cavalry_offensive = -0.2
    light_cavalry_defensive = -0.6
    knights_offensive = -0.2
    knights_defensive = -0.6
    archers_offensive = 1.8
    archers_defensive = -0.7

}
